articles.content:
Talks between WPK and New Communist Party of Great Britain
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Talks between secretary of the central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe T
thae Bok and general secretary of the central committee of the New Communist Party of Great Britain Andy Brooks  were held in Pyongyang today.
   At the talks, the sides informed each other of the activities of their parties and exchanged views on developing the friendly relations between the two parties and a series of matters of common concern.

articles.content:
"Ulji Focus Lens"  joint military exercise to be staged
     Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the South Korean warhawks announced that they would stage a provocative " Ulji Focus Lens"    exercise, a drill of combined command post, over August 16-27, according to a report from Seoul.
   It is planned by the South Korea-U.S. " combined forces command"    to mobilize in the exercise over 56,000  ROK army men and 14,000 U.S. Forces in South Korea and U.S. Forces stationed in Japan and Guam island and the U.S. mainland as  well as the flagship of the U.S. Seventh Fleet "Blue-Ridge,"  too.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans arrive to participate in festival
articles.content:
Foreigners arrive to participate in international solidarity events
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Delegates of international organisations and delegations and delegates of solidarity organizations in different regions and countries arrived here on Tuesday by plane to participate in international solidarity functions to be held on the occasion of August 15.
   They were: general secretary of the central committee of the New Communist Party of Great Britain Andy Brooks, president of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers and honorary chairman of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea Amar Bentoumi, vice-chairman of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea and general secretary of the Good Green Guyana Robert Williams, vice-chairman of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea Paulette Pierson Mathy, delegate of the organization of solidarity of the peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America Noris Paz Hernandez, delegate of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO) Vidya Sekera, coordinator of the Asia-Pacific region of the World Peace Council and general secretary of the Bangladesh Peace Council Ali Aksad, a delegation of the World Peace Commission headed by O. P. Sharma who is chairman of the Asia-Pacific Lawyers Association, vice-chairman of the African regional committee of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and vice-chairman of the Tunisia-DPRK Friendship Association Mustapha Fersi and his party, secretary general of the Nordic Cooperation Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and chairman of the Denmark-the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Friendship Association Anders Kristensen and his party, delegate of the Asian regional committee to support Korea's reunification and chairman of the peace action committee of Nepal Surya Lal, and vice-chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification Oswaldo Larriva Alvarado.

articles.content:
Overseas Koreans arrive to participate in festival
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans arrived here on Tuesday to participate in the '99 grand pro-reunification festival for the independence and great unity of the nation and the 10th Pan-National Rally.
   Among them are a delegation of the U.S. headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) headed by its permanent chairman Yang Un Sik, a delegation of the Canada regional headquarters of Pomminryon headed by its chairman Jong Hak Phil, a delegation of the Australia regional headquarters of Pomminryon headed by vice-chairman Rim Yong Mo of the National Federation of Koreans in Australia and an art troupe of U.S.-resident Koreans.
